"Space Battleship Yamato" (Japanese:宇宙戦艦ヤマト)is the opening theme song to the japanese military space opera series of the same name. It was sung by Isao Sasaki and composed by Hiroshi Miyagawa, and Yu Aku wrote the lyrics. It was aired on October 5 1974, when the first episode of Space Battleship Yamato was aired on TV.
